body:
Welp. I retired, and now I guess I have to say thanks.

Here goes nothing...

Straightened- Although you were my boss, you still showed me how to have a good time and spam everyone with Cory in the House and Tunnel Snakes. Thanks for helping me join the community easily, and thanks for the movie nights.

Peachy- You will always be Peachygod. Keep up the good living and remember that I should have been demoted awhile ago. Thanks for the laughs, and for making me feel like I was important on this server.

Cyanide- You are a k1d. Keep on swimming!

Zac- Thanks for finally retiring and ending your rain of terror on the server. By the way, your infractions page sucks.

GrapeNotSoSmoothie- You're a really chill guy who I'd smoke with. Thanks for being Avicus' Black Community.

RefuseToSink- Redacted by staff

Steven- Become a good mod. Don't fail my expectations of you. 

Mango- Thanks for stealing all my maps. I still love you though.

Cole- Thank you for always being their to help when I needed it. 

DoctorPoop- Thanks for the Spanish Castle Magic and all the good skype mood quotes.

Merlin- You're a crazy dude. Keep on shinning.

Slicorn- Thank you for everything master.

VenomousViper- You're swag.

Petlas- Thanks for being almost as awesome as I am.

Para- You're just a great person, and I aspire to be as nice as you are.

MusicBot- Why do you exist? You are something of hell.

Thanks to everyone I forgot, you know who you are. Don't expect me to be very active, but I will still always remember what this server has taught me.

Remember to Dream On

Remember to Dream On

replies.body:
Well, here we go Zac.

To your first point, Aerosmith's "thanks" to Refuse was rude, uncalled for and utterly idiotic. If that isn't salt, tell me what is.
About 99, I really haven't seen much evidence of his actions after his demotion. I don't care either.

Your last point made me laugh. I joined the Resistance before my demotion. It was being involved in it that ended my time as staff. Selling the Resistance out was something that needed to be done. The Resistance agreed for me to tell the truth, so I did. Also, what's the point of lying when they already know?

I don't feel roasted, I'm still as cold as ever.

replies.body: Aero's message to Refuse had nothing to do with his retirement nor is it any of your concern (I believe it was addressed to refuse who is in fact capable of holding her own without you) . Aero gets to be mad when someone who pretends to be his friend is actually going behind his back trying to get him demoted. If it happened to you or anyone else I am sure you/they would have something to say about it. 99 himself even admitted to bad behavior after his demotion so you must be blinded by your bias. You joined the resistance before your last demotion but after the first. You did actually rat on the Resistance to Michael as confirmed by Michael himself, why exactly would they want you to rat them out? :3

You joined the resistance before your last demotion but after the first. You did actually rat on the Resistance to Michael as confirmed by Michael himself, why exactly would they want you to rat them out? :3
